product_name: Climb On! Skin Repair Bar - 0.5 oz.
long_description: All-natural, soothing Climb On! Skin Repair bar protects and moisturizes dry or chapped skin. it's great for climbers, skiers and mountaineers. Comes in an airtight tin for taking anywhere-just pop the balm bar out and rub it on. Includes grapeseed oil, apricot kernel oil, beeswax, wheat germ oil, essential oils and vitamins A, C and E. Antiseptic and antibacterial balm works like a second skin; pack it into dry, split skin, cuts or lesions for all-day protection. Can be applied to ripped tips, knuckles, sun and windburn, cuts, rashes, bites, poison ivy, cold sores, eczema, psoriasis and more! Convenient and portable 0.5 oz. size. Free of petroleum products, preservatives, fillers, additives, sensitizers and fragrances.
short_description: All-natural, soothing Climb On! Skin Repair bar protects and moisturizes dry or chapped skin. it's great for climbers, skiers and mountaineers.
